name: MONSTER X
description:
New dangers have emerged. Mutated and powerful monsters are destroying our city. We must take action!
Use a total of 4 weapons (Gun Sword / Gauntlets / Cannon / Bow) to fight with the enemy, flexibly use props, collect monster materials, modified weapons and defeat your enemy!

・Gun Sword - Accumulate and release blade's energy


・Gauntlets - Reloading and quick punches


・Cannon - Powerful firepower coverage


・Bow - Fast attack and dodge


The monsters are gathering to attack! Challenge a total of 16 different monsters! Defeat monsters to unlock weapons and collect monster materials to modified your weapons!

・Fierce and swift - Metal Garwolf


・Firepower and drilling - Mechanical Mantis


・Flying and breathing fire - Mechanical Ash Dragon


・Spray venom - Tree Mantis


・Violent and ferocious - Tyrannosaurus
